name: Destiny Bond Demo (Fidens_Libertas) (Fidens_Libertas)
description:
A pair of sisters living in poverty take on a high risk job to improve their lot in life. However they never expected this job would lead into a journey to save the world.

here's a game i've been working on for some time. this is my first project so i hope you'll find it to your liking.

as for its title i do want to mention that i'm not yet decided on what to call it. i chose the words destiny and bond as they relate to themes that the story will explore but i'm hoping i'll come up with a better title when it's done.

i also wanna mention that i am looking for people to help me with this project by making some custom assets for me. i'm especially looking to recruit an artist to make custom artworks for me, specifically monsters and backgrounds for the battles.

another asset i could make use of is music. so if any composers are interested i hope you'll consider it.

so if anyone with these skills or any other skills they wish to contribute are interested simply message me. the full release will be released commercially and all participants will receive equal pay.

finally i also wanna mention that i welcome all feedback and criticism. that said, i encourage you to write your criticism in a calm and composed manner. if you write your criticism with words in all cap to imply anger and yelling that may discourage me from addressing the issue you have with this game.
